author: Maggie Fitzgerald
title: Stay-at-home trend creates buying opportunities for tech survivors and 'bounce-back' stocks
description: After surveying thousands of people, William Blair named streaming platform Netflix its top near-term pick during the coronavirus crisis that is forcing an increasing number of people to quarantine or work from home.
content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only.)
Netflix, along with a few other technology stocks, are poised to benefit from increased demand thanks to the stay-at-home trend, according to William Blair.
